languages.text: В дни падения протектората фон Валанциус на Фолстоуне случилась чудовищная бойня. Миллионы паломников, слепо отвергая весть о предательстве Вольного Торговца, попытались дать отпор верным Империуму силам, и святые статуи пали под залпами макропушек, а бесчисленное множество набожных людей погибло с именем гнусно{mf|го|й} изменни{mf|ка|цы} на устах.

An ungodly massacre took place on Foulstone in the last days of the von Valancius protectorate. Millions of pilgrims blindly rejected the news of the Rogue Trader's apostasy and tried to fight back against the forces loyal to the Imperium, until holy statues crumbled under the volleys of macro-cannons and innumerable pious souls perished with the betrayer's name on their lips.
languages.original_text: В дни падения протектората фон Валанциус на Фолстоуне случилась чудовищная бойня. Миллионы паломников, слепо отвергая весть о предательстве Вольного Торговца, попытались дать отпор верным Империуму силам, и святые статуи пали под залпами макропушек, а бесчисленное множество набожных людей погибло с именем гнусно{mf|го|й} изменни{mf|ка|цы} на устах.

An ungodly massacre took place on Foulstone in the last days of the von Valancius protectorate. Millions of pilgrims blindly rejected the news of the Rogue Trader's apostasy and tried to fight back against the forces loyal to the Imperium, until holy statues crumbled under the volleys of macro-cannons and innumerable pious souls perished with the betrayer's name on their lips.

languages.text: 在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝最后的那段日子里，荒寂岩地发生了一起邪恶的大屠杀。数以百万计的朝圣者不肯接受行商浪人背叛帝国的消息，打算反击忠于帝国的军队。到最后，海军舰队进行了宏炮齐射，行商浪人的雕像在炮火之下化为灰烬，无数忠诚的追随者也一同丧命于此，死前依然喃喃地以叛徒的名字祈祷。
languages.original_text: An ungodly massacre took place on Foulstone in the last days of the von Valancius protectorate. Millions of pilgrims blindly rejected the news of the Rogue Trader's apostasy and tried to fight back against the forces loyal to the Imperium, until holy statues crumbled under the volleys of macro-cannons and innumerable pious souls perished with the betrayer's name on their lips.

traits.locale_text: 在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝最后的那段日子里，荒寂岩地发生了一起邪恶的大屠杀。数以百万计的朝圣者不肯接受行商浪人背叛帝国的消息，打算反击忠于帝国的军队。到最后，海军舰队进行了宏炮齐射，行商浪人的雕像在炮火之下化为灰烬，无数忠诚的追随者也一同丧命于此，死前依然喃喃地以叛徒的名字祈祷。

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の末期、ファウルストーンで非道な大虐殺が起こった。何百万という巡礼者は自由開拓者の背教の知らせを盲目的に信じず、帝国に忠実な軍に対抗しようとした。しかしそれも、マクロキャノンの一斉掃射で聖像が崩れおち、無数の信心深い者たちが裏切り者の名を口にしながら死に行くまでのことだった。
languages.original_text: An ungodly massacre took place on Foulstone in the last days of the von Valancius protectorate. Millions of pilgrims blindly rejected the news of the Rogue Trader's apostasy and tried to fight back against the forces loyal to the Imperium, until holy statues crumbled under the volleys of macro-cannons and innumerable pious souls perished with the betrayer's name on their lips.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の末期、ファウルストーンで非道な大虐殺が起こった。何百万という巡礼者は自由開拓者の背教の知らせを盲目的に信じず、帝国に忠実な軍に対抗しようとした。しかしそれも、マクロキャノンの一斉掃射で聖像が崩れおち、無数の信心深い者たちが裏切り者の名を口にしながら死に行くまでのことだった。

languages.text: Durant les derniers jours du protectorat von Valancius, Rochepeste fut le théâtre d'un massacre impie. Des millions de pèlerins rejetèrent aveuglément l'annonce de l'apostasie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et tentèrent de riposter contre les troupes loyales à l'Imperium, jusqu'à ce que des statues saintes s'effondrent sous les salves de macro-canons et que d'innombrables âmes pieuses périssent en criant le nom {mf|du traître|de la traîtresse}.
languages.original_text: An ungodly massacre took place on Foulstone in the last days of the von Valancius protectorate. Millions of pilgrims blindly rejected the news of the Rogue Trader's apostasy and tried to fight back against the forces loyal to the Imperium, until holy statues crumbled under the volleys of macro-cannons and innumerable pious souls perished with the betrayer's name on their lips.

traits.locale_text: Durant les derniers jours du protectorat von Valancius, Rochepeste fut le théâtre d'un massacre impie. Des millions de pèlerins rejetèrent aveuglément l'annonce de l'apostasie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et tentèrent de riposter contre les troupes loyales à l'Imperium, jusqu'à ce que des statues saintes s'effondrent sous les salves de macro-canons et que d'innombrables âmes pieuses périssent en criant le nom {mf|du traître|de la traîtresse}.

languages.text: Una masacre sacrílega tuvo lugar en Rocainmunda en los últimos días del protectorado von Valancius. Millones de peregrinos hicieron oídos sordos a las noticias de la apostasía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente e intentaron rechazar a las fuerzas leales al Imperium, hasta que sus estatuas sagradas se desmoronaron bajo las descargas de los macrocañones e innumerables fieles murieron con el nombre de{mf|l| la} traidor{mf||a} en los labios.
languages.original_text: An ungodly massacre took place on Foulstone in the last days of the von Valancius protectorate. Millions of pilgrims blindly rejected the news of the Rogue Trader's apostasy and tried to fight back against the forces loyal to the Imperium, until holy statues crumbled under the volleys of macro-cannons and innumerable pious souls perished with the betrayer's name on their lips.

traits.locale_text: Una masacre sacrílega tuvo lugar en Rocainmunda en los últimos días del protectorado von Valancius. Millones de peregrinos hicieron oídos sordos a las noticias de la apostasía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente e intentaron rechazar a las fuerzas leales al Imperium, hasta que sus estatuas sagradas se desmoronaron bajo las descargas de los macrocañones e innumerables fieles murieron con el nombre de{mf|l| la} traidor{mf||a} en los labios.

languages.text: Ein gottloses Massaker fand in den letzten Tagen des Protektorats von Valancius auf Foulstone statt. Millionen von Pilgern wiesen die Nachricht von der Apostase {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} blind zurück und lehnten sich gegen die imperiumstreuen Truppen auf, bis heilige Statuen unter den Salven der Makrokanonen einstürzten und unzählige fromme Seelen mit dem Namen {mf|des Verräters|der Verräterin} auf den Lippen untergingen.
languages.original_text: An ungodly massacre took place on Foulstone in the last days of the von Valancius protectorate. Millions of pilgrims blindly rejected the news of the Rogue Trader's apostasy and tried to fight back against the forces loyal to the Imperium, until holy statues crumbled under the volleys of macro-cannons and innumerable pious souls perished with the betrayer's name on their lips.

traits.locale_text: Ein gottloses Massaker fand in den letzten Tagen des Protektorats von Valancius auf Foulstone statt. Millionen von Pilgern wiesen die Nachricht von der Apostase {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} blind zurück und lehnten sich gegen die imperiumstreuen Truppen auf, bis heilige Statuen unter den Salven der Makrokanonen einstürzten und unzählige fromme Seelen mit dem Namen {mf|des Verräters|der Verräterin} auf den Lippen untergingen.

languages.text: Von Valancius protektorasının son günlerinde Menfurtaş'ta korkunç bir katliam yaşandı. Milyonlarca seyyah, Hür Tacir'in dinden çıktığına dair haberleri körlemesine reddetti ve İmparatorluk'a sadık kuvvetlere karşı koymaya çalıştı. Sonrasında kutsal heykeller, makro topların salvoları altında parçalandı; sayısız dini bütün kimse, dudaklarında hainin adıyla can verdi.
languages.original_text: An ungodly massacre took place on Foulstone in the last days of the von Valancius protectorate. Millions of pilgrims blindly rejected the news of the Rogue Trader's apostasy and tried to fight back against the forces loyal to the Imperium, until holy statues crumbled under the volleys of macro-cannons and innumerable pious souls perished with the betrayer's name on their lips.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius protektorasının son günlerinde, Menfurtaş'ta korkunç bir katliam yaşandı. Milyonlarca seyyah, Hür Tacir'in dinden çıktığına dair haberleri körlemesine reddetti ve İmparatorluk'a sadık kuvvetlere karşı mücadele etmeye çalıştı. Ta ki kutsal heykeller makro topların salvoları altında parçalanana ve sayısız dini bütün kişi, dudaklarında hainin adıyla can verene kadar.
